test_cases.name: Brute Force Login Pattern
test_cases.log: Failed SSH login from 203.0.113.9 repeated 14 times in 2 minutes.

test_cases.name: Ransomware Indicator
test_cases.log: Mass file rename events and high entropy extensions detected on shared drive.

test_cases.name: DDoS Traffic Spike
test_cases.log: Inbound HTTP requests jumped to 9 million per minute from botnet-like IP range.

test_cases.name: Phishing Campaign
test_cases.log: Multiple users clicked lookalike SSO link from spoofed sender domain.

test_cases.name: Port Scan Recon
test_cases.log: Sequential connection attempts observed across ports 22, 80, 443, 3389 from one host.

test_cases.name: Privilege Escalation Suspicion
test_cases.log: Service account granted admin role outside approved change window.
